snippet.title: Arma 3 Art of War - Charity Pack Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW - Admire splendid community artwork, recover priceless cultural property, and proudly wear your parade uniform in the Arma 3 Art of War charity DLC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1325500/Arma_3_Art_of_War_Charity_Pack/

---

UPDATE NOVEMBER 30, 2021
100% of Bohemia Interactive's proceeds after tax from the Arma 3 Art of War charity DLC was donated to the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC). The total amount raised and donated was $155,783. For more details, please read the announcement: https://arma3.com/news/arma-3-art-of-war-dlc-raises-155783-for-charity. We thank everyone for their contribution! The Art of War DLC is now free for everyone who owns Arma 3.

---

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION

100% of Bohemia Interactive's proceeds after tax from the Arma 3 Art of War charity DLC will be donated to the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC). After the initial fundraising period, this DLC will eventually become free to all owners of Arma 3 towards the end of 2021.

Check out our official store ➡ https://store.bistudio.com/

Get the Arma 3 Art of War Charity Pack:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1325500/ 

The Arma 3 Art of War Charity Pack features an in-game art exhibition showcasing community artwork, a new singleplayer combat scenario, and new game assets such as a formal suit, parade uniform, new backpack, and various t-shirts. It also adds several props related to art galleries and memorials that can be used in custom scenarios and compositions. 

You can now purchase the Arma 3 Art of War DLC for just $1.99 USD/€1.99 EUR/£1.99 GBP on Steam. People who wish to donate more to the cause can get the DLC at two higher optional price tiers (all three purchase options include the same content): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1325500/

On behalf of everyone at Bohemia Interactive and the ICRC, we thank you for your contribution!

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410

#Arma3 #Charity #ICRC
